subject: Golf
lead_paragraph: Lydia Ko, 17, broke free from a late tie with So Yeon Ryu, hitting a wedge to 4 feet for birdie on the 72nd hole on Sunday to win the Marathon Classic in Sylvania, Ohio.
snippet: Lydia Ko, 17, broke free from a late tie with So Yeon Ryu, hitting a wedge to 4 feet for birdie on the 72nd hole on Sunday to win the Marathon Classic in Sylvania, Ohio.
